title: rolling stone
author: rolling stone
created_time: November 22, 2022, 11:30:23 AMLast edit: December 11, 2022, 04:20:35 PM by rolling stone
content: CHAIN UNIVERSE GAMES BOUNTY CAMPAIGNChain Universe is a global legal company and the only blockchain racing game in the world. 1) On the public chain, the lottery by block number cannot be tampered with. The lottery results are consistent with users around the world, because of its fairness, fairness and openness, users are popular all over the world!2). Welcome to the chain universe blockchain game platform, you can make money without any investment. Register for free to participate in the life-long daily lottery, and you can get up to 1,000,000 TRX. Recommend our platform to your friends and get great commissions. Promoted to a platform partner to achieve financial freedom!3) Chain Universe is a global game ecological company. The game currently has more than 100,000 real users in 132 countries around the world. As the legal currency of each country is different. In order to make the deposit and withdrawal of global users more convenient, our payment methods are uniformly selected as cryptocurrency, stable currency, TRON, BNB.More details on the website: https://www.chain-universe.com/app/index.php?i=1&c=entry&m=ewei_shopv2&do=mobile&r=account.registers&code=361647&mid=361647&posterid=5● Bounty Campaign Duration: November 23 - December 20, lasts for 4 weeks● Tokens will be distributed to participants after the end of bounty, which is escrowed● Checking will be weekly● Join Chain Universe Games on social media:- Telegram● You will receive weekly stakes for performing certain actions, the stakes will be converted into TRX, according to the formula (total number of TRX/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be bannedFormat for proof of authentication post:Code:Proof of authentication:- BitcoinTalk Username:- Bitcointalk Profile Link:- Telegram Username:- Chain Universe Game ID Number:- Chain Universe Game gmail:- TRX (trc-20) Address:Bounty campaign reward pool: 1000$ worth TRX will be distributed through this bounty campaign which is escrowed, but can be changed according to the selected participant limit.  Rewards dislocation:● Video:  100%VIDEO CAMPAIGNRewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes (5000+views)● High: 3 stakes (3000+ views● Good: 2 stake (2000+ views)● Average: 1 stake (1000+ views)● Each participant can send:                                            - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 8 videos ( No more than 2 video a week)● YouTube videos must be useful, informative and the video description must include 30+ words of original text about the Chain Universe Games● A video for a TikTok should be creative, interesting, and tiktok style. Long video reviews on the TikTok will not be judged!● Content topics:The video topic should contain:1) What is Chain Universe Games about?2) How to create account on Chain Universe Games using the link https://www.chain-universe.com/app/index.php?i=1&c=entry&m=ewei_shopv2&do=mobile&r=account.registers&code=361647&mid=361647&posterid=5 ?3) How to play the Chain Universe Games?4) What Are The rules of the game?5) How to make money in the Lian universe? What are the strategies? - Information can be used from social networks: Chain Universe Games Websiteand use hashtags: #chainuniversegames #universegames #TRX #blockchain #crypto #cryptocurrency● Top 50 Videos will be selected● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from others' work will be rejected● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, Project website, Telegram group, Your referral link ● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materialsHow to join:  1. Join Chain Universe Games on social media:- Telegram2. Join Chain Universe Bounty Group:- Telegram. Fill out the form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeEu-kzMkn7eCKwo-HT1aHwQTO3_grNHuqb1SsDNRAEt46U5A/viewform?usp=sf_link. Spreadsheet:https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Hz0ENo0nICQRYLuGrHAV1T6XINC-wBzttjFyZq3kKtw/edit?usp=sharingDisclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
